title: jackmurray
author: jackmurray
created_time: June 06, 2023, 07:40:48 AMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 04:07:02 AM by jackmurray
content: To purchase any item from https://aliexpress.com: 1. Paste the link to the item in this thread or send the link to support@nakamoto.market. 2. Then we will reply with a link where you can purchase the item with Bitcoin.Or visit https://nakamoto.market to see some Bitcoin T-Shirts.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on June 06, 2023, 07:40:48 AMSome cool Bitcoin t-shirts at https://nakamoto.market. They accept Bitcoin.Use code BITCOINTALK at checkout to receive a 50% discount for the next 7 days.Is this your website or you are affiliated with them?Problem is that I don't see any option to pay with Bitcoin, only paypal, cards, google & apple pay are available in checkout page.I also don't see information from what country is everything shipped.PSI sure won't buy those binance branded stuff

comments.author: jackmurray
comments.created_time: June 07, 2023, 01:55:16 AMLast edit: June 07, 2023, 02:23:10 AM by jackmurray
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on June 06, 2023, 07:57:49 PMIs this your website or you are affiliated with them?Yeah, that's me. I've updated the post.Quote from: dkbit98 on June 06, 2023, 07:57:49 PMProblem is that I don't see any option to pay with Bitcoin, only paypal, cards, google & apple pay are available in checkout page.I also don't see information from what country is everything shipped.Shipping is from China. I've added that to the welcome message now, thanks.I'm really surprised you don't see the option in the checkout page.Here's what I can see:I had a problem earlier where people viewing in their local currency couldn't see the option to pay with Bitcoin, but I thought I fixed that by disabling non-USD viewing on the site.I've disabled other forms of payment, now this is all I see:Can you please check the website again? I would really appreciate it if you can help me solve this issue!Quote from: dkbit98 on June 06, 2023, 07:57:49 PMPSI sure won't buy those binance branded stuff  LolI've removed the Binance items from the site.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on June 07, 2023, 01:55:16 AMI'm really surprised you don't see the option in the checkout page.Yeah, well Bitcoin is not mentioned anywhere on website, btc logo is not in footer of main page, and I didn't saw that section in checkout page. Maybe the reason is because I didn't fill up all my personal information and shipping address in checkout page, and this shows up later.Good that you are using BTCPay Server, but my suggestion is to add clearly visible bitcoin payment options in places I mentioned.Quote from: jackmurray on June 06, 2023, 07:40:48 AMWe can resell anything that is available on https://aliexpress.com/, if anybody has any requests please let us know!Should we contact you on website with email or some other way, and what are the prices compared to Aliexpress?I also know another website that cloned Aliexpress website with similar name, and they accept bitcoin and crypto payment.Quote from: jackmurray on June 07, 2023, 01:55:16 AMCan you please check the website again? I would really appreciate it if you can help me solve this issue!I did check again, entering random data and Pay with BTCPAY logo showed up, so it's working ok.Quote from: jackmurray on June 07, 2023, 01:55:16 AMI've removed the Binance items from the site.You didn't have to remove it but they are not very popular right now.Maybe making custom made tshirts would be cool

comments.author: jackmurray
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on June 07, 2023, 08:33:47 PMShould we contact you on website with email or some other way, and what are the prices compared to Aliexpress?You can contact support@nakamoto.market or just post in the forums here.With the BITCOINTALK discount it is the same cost as aliexpress + shipping + $2.5Quote from: dkbit98 on June 07, 2023, 08:33:47 PMI did check again, entering random data and Pay with BTCPAY logo showed up, so it's working ok.Thank you for checking that.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on June 07, 2023, 09:31:04 PMWith the BITCOINTALK discount it is the same cost as aliexpress + shipping + $2.5Is that working only for purchasing clothes or for anything else that is listed on Aliexpress?

comments.author: jackmurray
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on June 08, 2023, 07:37:27 PMQuote from: jackmurray on June 07, 2023, 09:31:04 PMWith the BITCOINTALK discount it is the same cost as aliexpress + shipping + $2.5Is that working only for purchasing clothes or for anything else that is listed on Aliexpress?At the moment only clothes are on the site, but I'm happy to add anything else.The code will work with every item on the store.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on June 09, 2023, 04:31:29 AMAt the moment only clothes are on the site, but I'm happy to add anything else.I was thinking about items that are ordered from Aliexpress via Nakamoto.market.

comments.author: jackmurray
comments.created_time: June 10, 2023, 02:10:06 AMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 04:17:52 AM by jackmurray
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on June 09, 2023, 08:28:04 PMQuote from: jackmurray on June 09, 2023, 04:31:29 AMAt the moment only clothes are on the site, but I'm happy to add anything else.I was thinking about items that are ordered from Aliexpress via Nakamoto.market.The BITCOINTALK discount only applies to t-shirts.
